itunes:title: Listen to this if you need to move on from an ex
title: Listen to this if you need to move on from an ex
itunes:author: Joey Kidney
itunes:summary:
You might feel damaged, broken, or even used when the one you love leaves you. 

They leave your bright world completely grey and everything loses taste. 

And we are stuck with the question that seems to have no answer.. how do we move on?

Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-happy-times/exclusive-content
